thread.title: 5 star experience
thread.title_full: 5 star experience - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: JaneRu
title: 5 star experience
text:
Excellent location, wonderful service.
The location of the hotel is assessable to all the shows, restaurants and bar in soho. It is also very close to a few train stations.
The receptionist Katrina and floor staff Georgi provided wonderful service, they're extremely helpful, friendly and checked with us a few times during our stay, to make sure everything is fine.
The spa staff are all very polite too.
Special thanks to Katrina and Georgi for your help!
